CaPO4Sim 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    CaPO4Sim, the virtual physiology simulator

    Repository of NCCR project containing shiny apps of Calcium Phosphate homeostasis

    Staff

    • Project manager: Dr. Diane de Zélicourt and Prof. Vartan Kurtcuoglu
    • Experts in Physiology:
      • Prof. François Verrey,
      • Prof. Olivier Bonny,
      • Prof. Bernard Rossier,
      • Prof. Carsten Wagner
    • Graphic designer: Tara von Grebel
    • Animation: Janine Meyer
    • Model developer: Dr. David Granjon
    • Web/R developer: Dr. David Granjon
    • Server management: Dr. David Granjon
    • Server expert: Dr. Sergio Maffioletti
    • Consultants: Dr. Nathalie Debard

    Aknowledgments

    I am also very grateful to the Shiny developers and RStudio team, who provide a lot of useful softwares and packages.

    I finally thanks: Dean Attali (shinyjs), Karline Soetaert and Thomas Petzoldt (deSolve), Carson Sievert (plotly), the datastorm team (visNetwork), the dream R team, especially Victor Perrier (shinyWidgets), Hadley Wickham and the Tidyverse team (purrr and stringr), Eric Bailey (shinyMenus and shinyBS), Andrew Sali (shinycssloaders), Yang Tang (shinyjqui), Ian Lyttle (bsplus), Kent Russell (sweetalertR), Carl Ganz and Afshin Mehrabani (rintrojs), Andy Merlino (shinyFeedback)

    library(shiny)
library(ygdashboard)
require(visNetwork)
library(shinyBS)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)
library(deSolve)
library(shinythemes)
library(shinyjs)
library(shinycssloaders)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(shinyjqui)
library(bsplus)
library(sweetalertR)
library(shinytoastr)
library(shinyMenus)
library(stringr)
library(purrr)
library(rintrojs)
library(shinyFeedback)
library(magrittr)
library(DT)

    Global App

    • find another place to put the active slider(s), maybe in the navbar so that they are always visible (DONE)

    • the size of the box should scale each screen (and file the whole half page, which is not the case now)

    • improve help navigation (DONE)
    • adjust the human background (DONE)

    Case studies App

    • the size of the box should scale each screen (and file the whole half page, which is not the case now)
